English.title: SlideForge Pro
English.subtitle: Advanced AI-powered Presentation Generator
English.system_prompt_titles: You are an assistant that generates PowerPoint slide titles.
English.user_prompt_titles: Generate {count} clear and concise slide titles for a presentation about '{topic}'. Return each title on a new line without numbering.
English.system_prompt_content: You are an assistant that generates PowerPoint slide content.
English.user_prompt_content: Generate concise and informative content for a PowerPoint slide titled '{slide_title}'. Use bullet points and keep it to 4-5 key points.
